        public java9.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Void> addChatRoom(java.lang.String senderId,
                                                                           java.lang.String recieverId)
        Adds new chat room to both me and the person I want to message. Also checks if there is already a chat between the two.

        recieverId - the person I want to message's id
